
# Chapter 1


## Open Data Science, spring 2017

### Description of the course

*This course is an online course using programs like R, RStudio and Github. Every week there are DataCamp and R exercises to be submitted on Wednesday's and Friday's. There will also be peer-reviews on the RStudio exercises.*

The course grade will consist of grades from three different sources:

1. Points from DataCamp exercises

2. Points from RStudio exercises

3. Points from the final assignment
